bug.cf_doc_type: If docs needed, set a value

long_desc.thetext:
Description of problem: Broken python2-ipython-gui dependency/obsoleting
Version-Release number of selected component (if applicable): python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26
How reproducible:
Steps to Reproduce: 1. run dnf upgrade 2. 3.
Actual results: Problem 1: package python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch requires python2-ipython-console = 3.2.1-12.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - package python2-ipython-5.3.0-4.fc26.noarch obsoletes python2-ipython-console < 5.3.0-1 provided by python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - package python2-ipython-5.3.0-4.fc26.noarch obsoletes python2-ipython-console < 5.3.0-1 provided by python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - cannot install the best update candidate for package python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - cannot install the best update candidate for package python2-ipython-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch Problem 2: problem with installed package python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - package python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch requires python2-ipython-console = 3.2.1-12.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - package python2-ipython-gui-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch requires python2-ipython-console = 3.2.1-12.fc26, but none of the providers can be installed - package python2-ipython-5.3.0-4.fc26.noarch obsoletes python2-ipython-console < 5.3.0-1 provided by python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - package python2-ipython-5.3.0-4.fc26.noarch obsoletes python2-ipython-console < 5.3.0-1 provided by python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch - cannot install the best update candidate for package python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch
Expected results: Successfully upgraded
Additional info: After removing python2-ipython-gui successfully upgraded to python2-ipython-5.3.0-4.fc26.noarch obsoleting: python2-ipython-notebook-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch python2-ipython-console-3.2.1-12.fc26.noarch
My mistake. I forgot to include python-qtconsole in the update.
python-qtconsole-4.2.1-7.fc26 has been submitted as an update to Fedora 26. https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-ce6034c97b

python-qtconsole-4.2.1-7.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 testing repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report. See https://fedoraproject.org/wiki/QA:Updates_Testing for instructions on how to install test updates. You can provide feedback for this update here: https://bodhi.fedoraproject.org/updates/FEDORA-2017-ce6034c97b
python-qtconsole-4.2.1-7.fc26 has been pushed to the Fedora 26 stable repository. If problems still persist, please make note of it in this bug report.
